text: Bonjour! Bonjour from Paris! A quick update on #xoxoDorie #newsletter — it now lives over at @SubstackInc , and I've just published my first edition there. Catch up, subscribe, and share. Merci! xoxo

The thumbprints look great with that little chocolate topping. ION, the tweet about the Punitions was meant for @NYCrunner238 - but I know how much you, too, like those cookies :)

Glad you liked the Punitions. Lionel Poilâne of Poilâne bakery in Paris gave me the recipe - the cookies are still a staple at the iconic boulangerie. The story of how hard-and rewarding- it was to get the recipe is in my book Paris Sweets.
